name: Orbital Visualizer
description:
A simulation tool to visualize the solutions of the Schroedinger equation for the hydrogen atom in 3D. The electronic density is rendered as a beautiful 3D cloud of fog that makes for a fully navigable experience!

Made with Godot 4 RC 1 - and made possible by the new volumetric fog shaders, which allow for the calculations to happen in parallel on your GPU, so that you get excellent rendering in real time.

You can find the source code on GitHub.
